title: LAST HOPE RIOT
body:
AFTER 1000 games of elo fucking RIOT ... i go to silver 2 and mach make me whit bronze 3 vs gold 5 
bronze was rektt by gold 5 and i was demote .... 0/13/1 tnx RIOT TO KEEP ELO HEL REAL

replies.body:
Locking this thread since it's extremely old.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
You've played 1k games of ranked this season already? dayum.
Take a break.... that thing at the front of your house is a door.... try it out some time. There's a whole world waiting for you.
